name: Winter Cold
description:
" The turkey is cooking in the oven
As the family gathers around the table to pray
It's Christmas day and all they can do is cry... "


A little mute boy receives nothing he wished for on Christmas Day, but after he receives a mysterious gift, his life has completely changed.
“Winter Cold" is a drama visual novel featuring:

- A deep and heartbreaking storyline that touches many interesting themes and topics

- Brilliant art style, backgrounds and sprites

- Awesome background music
